profile.name: Proton Nazar
profile.title: Senior FullStack JavaScript & Web3 Developer
profile.description: I'm a Senior FullStack Developer with over three years of experience, driven by curiosity and the pursuit of excellence. I'm dedicated to continuous growth, eagerly expanding my skills and knowledge, and thriving in dynamic team settings. Challenges inspire me, and I approach each project believing any goal is achievable. Ready to contribute my expertise, I'm excited to bring impactful solutions to a forward-thinking team.

experience.description: Contributed to diverse client projects at BlackStack Labs, consistently delivering high-quality and efficient solutions while optimizing code for performance and stability. Enhanced integration processes and met project goals on schedule, ensuring client satisfaction with each deployment.

Acted as the sole developer in building an NFT marketplace with features like NFT migration, trading, and analytics. Developed complex UI effects and worked closely with designers to create an appealing user experience, focusing on seamless navigation and functionality.

Worked across multiple roles, including Full Stack and React Native developer, supporting well-known companies in creating impactful solutions that benefit humanity. Contributed to projects such as AI-driven security tools, investment platforms, and corporate applications, adding meaningful features and maintaining high standards of performance.

Contributed to a crypto fund platform, integrating smart contracts for staking, minting, and redeeming, and creating interactive dashboards. Developed two versions of their website independently and implemented a streamlined system for managing smart contracts, making processes more accessible and efficient.

Worked as part of a team on various client projects, focusing on building responsive, interactive interfaces and enhancing user engagement. Contributed innovative ideas and solutions for improved functionality and design, significantly enhancing user satisfaction.

Served as the lead developer, creating a staking and investment platform with Vue.js, focusing on user experience, cross-browser compatibility, and smooth interaction for crypto enthusiasts. Ensured a seamless and intuitive experience for end users.
